document.full_text: russian cinema fans rejoice: mosfilm, the film studio and production company, has posted 50 or so movies on youtube (in russian with english subtitles) and will add five a week to the online channel.
document.title: russian online film archive keeps growing
lines_and_colors: russian cinema fans rejoice: mosfilm, the film studio and production company, has posted 50 or so movies on youtube (in russian with english subtitles) and will add five a week to the online channel.
